CREATE TABLE photo_album_elements_metadata (id int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, title varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, element_id int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, number_of_results int(10) unsigned DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (id), KEY metadata_to_element (element_id), CONSTRAINT metadata_to_element FOREIGN KEY (element_id) REFERENCES elements (id) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE)

CREATE TABLE photo_album_element_labels (id int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, element_id int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, label_id int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (id) USING BTREE, KEY labels_key (label_id), KEY elements_id_key (element_id), CONSTRAINT element_id_to_element2 FOREIGN KEY (element_id) REFERENCES elements (id) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT label_id_to_image_label2 FOREIGN KEY (label_id) REFERENCES image_labels (id) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE)

CREATE TABLE webforms_handlers (id int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `type` varchar(255) NOT NULL, webform_id int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (id), CONSTRAINT webforms_handlers_to_webforms FOREIGN KEY (webform_id) REFERENCES webforms (id) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE RESTRICT)

CREATE TABLE webforms_handlers_properties (id int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, handler_id int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, name text NOT NULL, value text DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (id), CONSTRAINT handler_properties_to_handlers FOREIGN KEY (handler_id) REFERENCES webforms_handlers (id) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE RESTRICT)

CREATE TABLE iframe_elements_metadata (id int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, title varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, element_id int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, url VARCHAR(255) DEFAULT NULL, width int(10) DEFAULT NULL, height int(10) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (id), KEY iframe_element_metadata_to_element (element_id), CONSTRAINT iframe_element_metadata_to_element FOREIGN KEY (element_id) REFERENCES elements (id) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE)

CREATE TABLE article_comments (id int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, name varchar(255) NOT NULL, message TEXT NOT NULL, email_address TEXT NOT NULL, article_id int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, parent int(10) unsigned DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (id), KEY comment_to_article (article_id), CONSTRAINT comment_to_article FOREIGN KEY (article_id) REFERENCES articles (element_holder_id) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE RESTRICT, KEY comment_to_comment (parent), CONSTRAINT comment_to_comment FOREIGN KEY (parent) REFERENCES article_comments (id) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE RESTRICT)

CREATE TABLE template_vars (id int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, name varchar(255) NOT NULL, value TEXT DEFAULT NULL, template_id int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (id), KEY template_vars_to_templates (template_id), CONSTRAINT template_vars_to_templates FOREIGN KEY (template_id) REFERENCES templates (id) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE RESTRICT)
CREATE TABLE template_files (id int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, name varchar(255) NOT NULL, filename varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (id))

CREATE TABLE template_var_defs (id int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, name varchar(255) NOT NULL, default_value TEXT DEFAULT NULL, template_file_id int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (id), KEY template_var_defs_to_template_files (template_file_id), CONSTRAINT template_var_defs_to_template_files FOREIGN KEY (template_file_id) REFERENCES template_files (id) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE RESTRICT)
